statements: SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM Inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, stock_quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, stock_quantity ASC, unit_price DESC
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT item_id, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 10.00 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT item_name, stock_level, last_ordered_date FROM inventory WHERE stock_level <= 10 AND last_ordered_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, item_name, stock_level, last_ordered_date FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 10 ORDER BY last_ordered_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_level, last_ordered_date FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 5 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment WHERE quantity >= 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC, location;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE last_ordered_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, item_name, stock_level, last_ordered_date FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY item_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT item_name, supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price < 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 101
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM equipment ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT item_name, stock_level, supplier_id FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.item_id = orders.item_id
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10)

SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT eq_name, quantity, price FROM equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;

SELECT eq_name, quantity, price FROM equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, stock_level, location FROM inventory JOIN locations ON inventory.location = locations.location_name WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT eq_name, quantity, price FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 20 AND price < 200 ORDER BY quantity ASC

SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level > 0;

SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
